hints.title: Transition Operator Descends to Configuration Space
hints.content:
798: :label: thm-transition-descends
799: 
800: The Adaptive Gas transition operator $\Psi: \Sigma_N \to \mathcal{P}(\Sigma_N)$ is gauge-invariant:
801: 
802: $$
803: \Psi(\sigma \cdot \mathcal{S}, \cdot) = (\sigma \cdot)_* \Psi(\mathcal{S}, \cdot)
804: 
805: $$
806: 
807: for all $\sigma \in S_N$, where $(\sigma \cdot)_*$ is the push-forward map on probability measures.
808: 
809: Therefore, $\Psi$ descends to a well-defined operator:
810: 
811: $$
812: \bar{\Psi}: \mathcal{M}_{\text{config}} \to \mathcal{P}(\mathcal{M}_{\text{config}})
